Class RLECompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • RLECompressor

  • public class RLECompressor
extends java.lang.Object
    Compress/decompress files, strings and byte arrays with run-length encoding.
    Version:
    1.0, 01/31/18
    Author:
    Matti Heiskanen
    See Also:
    https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Run-length_encoding
